# accessoryDidUpdateName(_:)

**Instance Method**

Informs the delegate when the name of the accessory is updated.

## Declaration

```swift
optional func accessoryDidUpdateName(_ accessory: HMAccessory)
```

## Parameters

- **accessory**: The accessory whose name changed.

## Related Documentation

- **HomeKit Developer Guide**

## Observing accessories

- **accessoryDidUpdateReachability(_:)**: Informs the delegate when the reachability of the accessory changes.
- **accessoryDidUpdateServices(_:)**: Informs the delegate when the services on the accessory have been updated.
- **accessory(_:didUpdateNameFor:)**: Informs the delegate when the name of a service is updated.
- **accessory(_:service:didUpdateValueFor:)**: Informs the delegate of a change in value of a characteristic.
- **accessory(_:didUpdateAssociatedServiceTypeFor:)**: Informs the delegate when the associated service type of a service is modified.
- **accessory(_:didAdd:)**: Informs the delegate when a profile is added to an accessory.
- **accessory(_:didRemove:)**: Informs the delegate when a profile is removed from an accessory.
- **accessory(_:didUpdateFirmwareVersion:)**: Informs the delegate when firmwareVersion has been changed for an accessory.
